# ============================================================================
# GENERATED BY PARA, PopcornSAR
# Copyright(c) 2024 by PopcornSAR Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.
# ============================================================================
 
add_executable(${PARA_APP_NAME})
 
# ============================================================================
# This setting is required for binary targets.
# Please modify the section below to suit your configuration.
# ============================================================================
Para_Target(${PARA_APP_NAME}
            PARA_LIBS_PRIVATE core log exec com
            PARA_GEN_DIR ${PARA_APP_GEN_DIR}
            OUTPUT_NAME ${PARA_APP_NAME}
)
# ============================================================================
target_include_directories(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                           PRIVATE
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../OSS_BPP/include
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../OSS_BPP/apps/behavior_path_planner/autoware_behavior_path_planner/include
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../OSS_BPP/apps/behavior_path_planner/autoware_behavior_path_planner_common/include)

target_compile_features(${PARA_APP_NAME} PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
# ============================================================================
target_link_libraries(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                      PRIVATE
                      pthread
                      autoware_behavior_path_planner_common
                      route_handler
                      rosless_utils
                      motion_utils
                      common_types)
# ============================================================================
target_sources(${PARA_APP_NAME}
               PRIVATE
               exe_behaviorpathplanner/aa/port/pport_bpp2bvp.cpp
               exe_behaviorpathplanner/aa/port/pport_bpp2mp.cpp
               exe_behaviorpathplanner/aa/port/rport_mp2bpp.cpp
               exe_behaviorpathplanner/aa/port/rport_scr2bpp.cpp
               ../OSS_BPP/apps/behavior_path_planner/autoware_behavior_path_planner/src/planner_manager.cpp
               ros2/ros_autosar_adapter.cpp
               behavior_path_planner_runner.cpp
               exe_behaviorpathplanner/aa/swc_behaviorpathplanner.cpp
               main.cpp
)
